title: I am the owner of the most autistic post of 2014

replies.body: It is the end of 2014, did you top the post in question (as it says in the comments)?

> [{quoted}](name=yaiamone,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fuOAKMhp,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-12-31T05:04:49.274+0000)
>
> It is the end of 2014, did you top the post in question (as it says in the comments)?

alas, I did not. Still, it is an achievement itself to own it in the first place.
